text: The arrondissement of Yssingeaux is an arrondissement of France. It is part of the Haute-Loire département. Its capital is the city of Yssingeaux, a subprefecture of the department. ==History== When the Haute-Loire department was created on 4 March 1790, the arrondissement of Yssingeaux, with the name of Le Puy, was part of that original department. In 1988, the name was changed to Puy-en-Velay. ==Geography== The arrondissement of Yssingeaux is bordered to the north by the Loire departmens, to the east and southeast by the Ardèche department, to the south and west by the arrondissement of Le Puy-en-Velay. The arrondissement is in the northeast of the department and is the smallest arrondissement in area, , but the second in population, with 84,676 inhabitants and a density of inhabitants/km². The department is in the basin of the Loire river. ==Composition== ===Cantons=== After the reorganisation of the cantons in France, cantons are not subdivisions of the arrondissements so they could have communes that belong to different arrondissements. In the arrondissement of Yssingeaux, there are 8 cantons: # Aurec-sur-Loire (4301) # Bas-en-Basset (4302) # Boutières (4303) # Deux Rivières et Vallées (4305) # Mézenc (4308) (partly) # Monistrol-sur-Loire (4309 # Plateau du Haut-Velay granitique (4311) (partly) # Yssingeaux (4319) ===Communes=== The arrondissement of Yssingeaux has 44 communes; they are (with their INSEE codes): # Araules (43007) # Aurec-sur-Loire (43012) #
